description:
The following methods were only used by the old LXC attach/detach volume code which was removed in https://review.openstack.org/17861 (commit b8831091a8d097bb55a0e65c3af254a8bfa88811). Remove them.

in nova.virt.disk.api:

- bind()
- unbind()
title: Remove unused virt.disk.api methods bind/unbind

commit dc3eb8e30d22085e8bad377f260f32ccde301933
Author: mathrock <email address hidden>
Date:   Sun Mar 17 01:26:53 2013 -0400

    Remove unused virt.disk.api methods bind/unbind
    
    The bind and unbind methods were only used by the old LXC
    attach/detach volume code which was removed in
    https://review.openstack.org/17861 (commit
    b8831091a8d097bb55a0e65c3af254a8bfa88811). Remove them.
    
    Fixes bug 1156127
